TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public interface auto ansi abstract View/IOnLayoutChangeListener implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the layout bounds of a view changes due to layout processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public void OnLayoutChange (Android.Views.View v, int left, int top, int right, int bottom, int oldLeft, int oldTop, int oldRight, int oldBottom);

Docs.param: The view whose state has changed.

Docs.summary: Called when the focus state of a view has changed.
